medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 5 days ago with decreased PO intake. She has had similar episodes several times per year which are often self-limiting with diet regulation within one week. Denies fevers, chills, diarrhea, or dizziness. Last bowel movement was 2 days ago, last gas passed was last night.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, seizure disorder, HTLV-1 associated myelopathy, tropical spastic paraplegia, benign neoplasm of nasal cavities/middle ear.
medical_history.family_history: Family history of colon cancer in brother (deceased), nephew with colon cancer (deceased). Two of three children have hypertension. Older sister died of pneumonia and complications of diabetes mellitus. Mother had cervical cancer (deceased).
medical_history.social_history: Lives with supportive family, including a grandson who assists her with activities of daily living. Has three children who are involved in her care. Has a distant history of smoking, no alcohol or drug use.
